value.title: Page and Bookmark Navigator in Power BI
value.excerpt: This video demonstrates how we can add Page Navigator and Bookmark navigator in Power BI. This is my favorite feature rolled out from Power BI November 2021 update! With Power BI'Page and Bookmark navigator, we can easily build navigation for our report. Previously, setting up a custom page or bookmark

value.title: Sort Legend in Power BI
value.excerpt: Welcome to Power BI Tips and Tricks Video. This is a short and sweet video demonstrating the functionality to apply Sort on Legend values in Power BI. value.title: The Power BI Smart Narrative visual is INSANE AMAZING!
value.excerpt: The smart narrative visual can help tell the story in your Power BI report. Justyna Lucznik joins us to explore the visual and to illustrate how you can generate text about your data.  Make sure you have the September 2020 version of Power BI Desktop, or later.  Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/visuals/power-bi-visualization-smart-narrative
